abstract.para: This is the definitive collection of Howto documents related to DRBD (Distributed Replicated Block Device). It is currently being assembled and is not yet ready for release, but even when it is, will always remain a work in progress.

The collection currently includes:
The DRBD Users' Guide (being written)

The collection does not yet include, but should include at some point:
The DRBD Developers' Guide (to be written)
